abstracts.cdata!:
Technical assistance and training
            subprojects, to be selected by mutual agreement, in the
            fields of pre-investment planning, feasibility or
            engineering studies, or strengthening institutions
            responsible for project preparation and implementation, or
            economic planning. There is a risk that the slow Government
            decision-making process may cause delays in appointment of
            consultants. The designation of a project coordinator under
            previous Technical Assistance projects has helped to
            expedite this process. The establishment of standardized
            procedures for subproject processing, now underway, should
            assure further progress in the future.
